categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Raymon was a Human male Sith of the Sith Empire. By the time of the Cold War he had joined the cult known as the Revanites and lived in their camp near Kaas City on the planet of Dromund Kaas. He was tasked with sending new cult members to their pilgrimage, a test serving as initiation in the Order of Revan.
